mapper.insert: insert into STUDY (user_id, book_no, title, body, total, img, start_date, end_date, reg_date, mod_date, status) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{book_no}, #{title}, #{body}, #{total}, #{img}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, NOW(), NOW(), #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDY SET status = 1 WHERE start_date > CURDATE()
mapper.select: select count(*) from STUDY where status = 1
select * from STUDY order by reg_date desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
